sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { Link, withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import { Layout, Menu, Icon } from "antd"; import "./MenuSider.scss"; function MenuSider(props) { const { menuCollapsed, location } = props; const { Sider } = Layout; return ( {/* Home */} Usuarios Men√∫ Cursos Blog Lista de Productos ); } export default withRouter(MenuSider);
